value:
I come from Caer Pelyn. It is very
remote, and the people there enjoy
simple lives.$k$pA festival as extravagant as this would
be beyond imagining to the people
there. What a marvel!

My life's purpose is to defend Myrrh,
the Great Dragon. Even here at this
festival, that purpose does not waver.

When all creation aligns in harmony,
the blessings of spring come upon us.
This cycle of rebirth is never-ending.

Gerik would enjoy this festival...
Perhaps I should have invited him.$k$pHe has become a dear friend. I will
forever be thankful he was able to
overcome his hatred of me.

If my apprentice, Ewan, were here, he
would almost certainly lose himself in
the revelry of this festival.

Spring tidings to you! I come with a
missive from $Nf.

Excellent! May this power bring the
festival even more joy.

Let the blessings of spring wash over
us all.

My apologies. I did not wish to put a
damper on the festivities...

Truth lives within the heart,
as does strength.

I am Saleh, from the village of Caer
Pelyn. Let us celebrate the coming of
spring, and build a world of harmony.

Ah, it is you, $Nu.$k$pI was practicing Valega, the ritual
of knowing and feeling harmony, of
finding one's self within the whole.$k$pWith enough dedication, it is said that
the rite can guide one to their most
noble and pure self.$k$pIt also reminds me of home. Valega
has been taught for generations in
the village of Caer Pelyn.$k$pIn many ways, I find the spring
festival of Askr to be much the
same...$k$pBoth are passed down as a tradition,
both honor harmony in nature, and
both remind their followers of home.$k$pIt brings me great joy to have a part
in keeping such an event alive and
vibrant.$k$pThank you for celebrating with me.
When spring comes again, I will
remember this day.
たあっ
どう出る？
うっ
Careless...
Spring has arrived.
Blessings of the land.
Open your eyes.
Bathe in warmth.
Am I...dreaming?
Sigh...

The spring festival... A time to give thanks
for all of creation's blessings.
Oh, sorry. I was distracted. This really is quite a festival.
I have never used a weapon like this... But I will do my best.

Align your desires with the world around you.
By knowing the vastness of creation,
you will come to know yourself.
I am...unused to such extravagant clothes.
Dragons and humans both share a love of spring. Such similarities help us live together peacefully.

The Great Dragon is having a wonderful time at the festival.
And we have you to thank!
Spring forth!
I...see...
What lovely weather.
